first_para: David Thomas Morris (born 3 January 1966, Leigh, Greater Manchester, England) is a British Conservative Party politician. He is Member of Parliament (MP) for Morecambe and Lunesdale in Lancashire, England.

full.extract:
David Thomas Morris (born 3 January 1966, Leigh, Greater Manchester, England) is a British Conservative Party politician. He is Member of Parliament (MP) for Morecambe and Lunesdale in Lancashire, England.
^ "Who's Who". Ukwhoswho.com. Retrieved 23 March 2013. 
^ "Morecambe and Lunesdale". BBC Election 2010. Retrieved 10 May 2010.
full.title: David Morris (Conservative politician)
